definition: disposition of troops/wave/spate/burst/spell/short period of time/classifier for events or states of short duration

sentences.english: This article is to investigate biorthogonal matrix-valued wavelet packets in higher dimensions.
sentences.chinese: 研究高維矩陣值雙正交小波包的構造及性質。

sentences.english: Jacobian matrix is one of the important parameters of robots.
sentences.chinese: 雅可比矩陣是描述機器人特徵的重要參數之一。

sentences.english: A substitution matrix lets you assign match scores individually to each pair of symbols.
sentences.chinese: 使用置換矩陣能夠根據每對符號單獨分配匹配得分。

sentences.english: In this note, a necessary and sufficient condition of diagonalization for square matrix is considering.
sentences.chinese: 方陣是否可以對角化，是矩陣的一條很重要的性質。

sentences.english: Next, you need to analyse the metrics.
sentences.chinese: 接下來，你需要分析這個矩陣。

sentences.english: The Transfer Matrix Method (TMM) and the Finite Element Method (FEM) are two ordinary calculating methods for rotary system.
sentences.chinese: 傳遞矩陣法和有限元法是轉子動力學分析的常用方法。

sentences.english: Setup a matrix for pixel-correct rendering.
sentences.chinese: 設置一個矩陣用於像素矯正渲染。

sentences.english: In this paper, a method for calculating seismic vulnerability matrix of brick masonry structure is put forward.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出一種計算磚砌體結構地震易損性矩陣的方法。

sentences.english: We update sensitivities matrix by the quasi-Newton method after the first inversion.
sentences.chinese: 在第一次反演之後，採用擬牛頓法更新靈敏度矩陣。

sentences.english: A new storage structure, named matrix octree, is given out.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出了一種矩陣式八叉樹的存儲結構。

sentences.english: Elementary transformation method of full rank decomposition of matrix and triangular decomposition of strongly full rank matrix;
sentences.chinese: 這些方法都是基於網關聯矩陣的滿秩分解。

sentences.english: The laboratory has two matrices capable of testing 40 radios.
sentences.chinese: 該實驗室有兩個矩陣，可測試40個無線電。

sentences.english: His essay offers an analysis of the film that focuses on the dreamlike nature of the world of the Matrix.
sentences.chinese: 他的文章主要分析電影中的夢幻般矩陣世界。

sentences.english: OK, let me give you another example of a matrix.
sentences.chinese: 好，下面給你們另一個矩陣的例子。

sentences.english: It means they are the inverse matrices.
sentences.chinese: 這就意味着它們是互逆的兩個矩陣。

sentences.english: Or, if a matrix is not invertible, then you have infinitely many solutions.
sentences.chinese: 或者矩陣不可逆時，有無窮解。
